translations: v.搬运；携带；拖曳；（不情愿地）赶往，缓慢费力地行进
n.拖轮；乏味而艰苦的旅程；跋涉；笨蛋；无用的人

phrs.translation: 携带, 搬运, 遥远的路程

sentences.sentence: Then it was back in the truck for a 150-mile schlep up the coast to Malibu.
sentences.translation: 然后把它装回卡车，沿着海岸经过150英里的跋涉运回马里布。

sentences.sentence: You no longer have to schlep to New York to see the most celebrated show on Broadway.
sentences.translation: 你再也不用远赴纽约去看百老汇最著名的表演了。

sentences.sentence: I schlep into the living room and program the TiVo myself.
sentences.translation: 我把TiVo录影机搬进客厅自己设定录制程序。
